DOC.brief_summary: To assess incidence , risk factor clinical course cystic macular lesion ( CMLs ) uncomplicated phacoemulsification evaluate efficacy topical NSAIDs prevention pseudophakic cystic macular lesion
DOC.brief_title: Pseudophakic Cystoid Macular Lesions After Uncomplicated Standard Phacoemulsification
DOC.detailed_description: 344 Patients undergo uncomplicated standard phacoemulsification Kyungpook National University Hospital 2013 2015 review . CMLs , cystic fluid collection cataract surgery , confirm preoperative postoperative optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) preoperative , postoperative 1month 3months examination . CMLs classify two group : cystic macular edema ( CME ) microcystic macular edema ( MME ) .
DOC.criteria: patient phacoemulsification treat postoperatively Kyungpook National University Hospital , Daegu , Korea , Oct 2013 June 2015. patient complicate cataract surgery ( eg , significant corneal edema , posterior capsule rupture , vitreous loss , drop nuclear material , retain cortical material , IOL place capsular bag )
